title: IBM News Gothic
content:
Someone's asked me for a specific IBM cut of News Gothic. Aparently it was used in Photosetting and possibly on daisy wheels. Does anyone know of any sources for this font? Possibly digital, although unlikely.   
   
Bruno Maag

 [‹ Stravinsky + Graph Paper](http://web.archive.org/web/20080216201326/http:/typophile.com/node/6760 "Go to previous forum topic") [What is the inside of a lowercase e called? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080216201326/http:/typophile.com/node/6794 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bruno_maag

comments.content:
Its been a few years, but I remember this coming up previously   
on Typophile. Maybe related, on page 18 of the Karel Martens   
Printed Matter book, there is a scan of IBM Selectric Composer   
Classified News. It looks very similar to News Gothic. Maybe   
they're related somehow.
